label: address

error-message-1: Enter a postal code that meets your country’s requirements. If your country doesn’t require a postal code, enter NA.
error-scenario-2: No entry. Include [5- or 9-digit] in the error message if the user has indicated that they live in the U.S.

notes-on-updates: Slight adjustment to make zip lowercase. And include "5- or 9-digit" when user has indicated that they live in the U.S.
